title: XP and IP Boost disappeared
body: When i first started getting back into League I bought the Starter Bundle pack which comes with XP and IP Boost and then I bought additional XP and IP Boost and I went to finally use them the other day and they are all gone now.. Does anyone know why?

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up, and it looks like the win boosts you had were added to your account early in 2016. Those boosts would have kicked in as soon as they were added, and it looks like you've played enough matches to have used them all up already.

Thank you for responding !  I did not know that they would kick in as soon as I got them so thank you for this information.  I was just wondering because I am taking a vacation from work and wanted to level up and gain some IP faster lol.
